rows.label: qst700601_msg0001
rows.name:
Haa... Maybe I really
can't do it after all...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0002
rows.name: Hey! Aren't you the boy from before!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0003
rows.name: Ah! It's you guys!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0004
rows.name: Marco, was it?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0005
rows.name: Are you in some kind of trouble again?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0006
rows.name: Ah, no, it's not like that...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0007
rows.name: What are you talking about?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0008
rows.name:
With a face like that,
looking down, it's the same
as saying you're worried.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0009
rows.name:
If you'd like, would you
talk to us about it?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0010
rows.name: Maybe we can help you again.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0011
rows.name: ...Adel!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0012
rows.name:
Are you planning on getting
involved in trouble again!?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0013
rows.name:
Now, now. They say "company
on the road, compassion
in the world," right?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0014
rows.name: That's true, but...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0015
rows.name: Come on, why don't you tell us?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0016
rows.name: U-Um...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0017
rows.name:
The other day, you guys got a
lot of bugs for me, right?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0018
rows.name:
I was really happy about that, but
then I realized that without you
guys, I can't do anything on my own.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0019
rows.name:
I thought maybe I could gather a lot
of bugs by myself this time, so I
drew up a blueprint for a machine.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0020
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0021
rows.name: But, what?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0022
rows.name:
I'm pretty good at tinkering with
machines, but this is the first
time I've built one from scratch.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0023
rows.name:
I'm so worried about whether it
will actually work if I build it
according to this blueprint.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0024
rows.name:
And that's why you said,
"Maybe I can't do it"?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0025
rows.name: ...Yeah.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0026
rows.name:
But to me, this blueprint
looks really impressive.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0027
rows.name:
At the very least, it wasn't drawn
with a half-hearted attitude.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0028
rows.name: ...Brother, do you know about machines?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0029
rows.name: Hahahaha! Not at all!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0030
rows.name: Eh!?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0031
rows.name: ...Idiot.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0032
rows.name: ...But, I can tell you're serious.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0034
rows.name:
Being so worried is just the flip
side of your serious desire to
complete it, no matter what.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0035
rows.name:
Beyond that feeling, there must
be "something" you want to
achieve at all costs, right?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0036
rows.name:
If that's the case, I don't need
any more reason to help you.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0037
rows.name:
You can do it... Let's
prove it together!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0038
rows.name: Brother...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0039
rows.name: Yeah, I get it!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0040
rows.name:
I won't give up, I'll see
it through to the end!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0041
rows.name:
First, about the "Automatic
Bug-Catching Machine DX"
drawn in this blueprint...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0042
rows.name: "Automatic Bug-Catching Machine DX"!?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0043
rows.name:
What a name, filled
with a man's romance!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0044
rows.name: ...Adel, be quiet for a moment.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0045
rows.name: Go on.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0046
rows.name: U-Um...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0047
rows.name:
To complete this machine,
there are still some machine
parts I'm missing.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0048
rows.name:
Specifically, I need three Sunset
Brackets and one Electroshaft.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0049
rows.name:
So, I want you guys to
help me gather these two
types of machine parts!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0050
rows.name: Yeah! I accept! Leave it to us!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0051
rows.name: Good grief...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0052
rows.name:
It's more than just being
soft on kids, they're acting
like kids themselves...
